name: XRWebGLLayerInit.depth
description: When using the XRWebGLLayer() constructor to create a new WebGL rendering layer for WebXR, providing as the layerInit parameter an object whose depth property is false will request that the new layer be created without a depth buffer.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRWebGLLayerInit.depth' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
